author: Lesley Waters
method: Mix the spinach, lentils, curry powder, egg, flour and chilli flakes together in a bowl. Form the mixture into two patties Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the patties for 2-3 minutes on each side until crisp and golden. Serve with Greek-style yoghurt.
